function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor correlation of one item in relation to the others may affect the overall accuracy of the findings.","Impact":"Inaccurate results may lead to incorrect conclusions and decision-making.","Mitigation":"Conduct a thorough analysis of the item, and consider redesigning or eliminating it from the study.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, data visualization tools.","People":"Research team, data analysts, statisticians.","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team."},{"Description":"Exclusion of an item due to low Cronbach's alpha may result in a loss of valuable insights or aspects of the phenomenon under study.","Impact":"Missing important information may lead to biased conclusions and incomplete understanding.","Mitigation":"Explore alternative methods for improving the reliability of the item before considering exclusion, such as revising the item or increasing the sample size.","Technologies":"Survey design tools, statistical analysis software.","People":"Research team, data analysts, statisticians.","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team."},{"Description":"Measurement of negative impact and emotions related to COVID-19 measures may lead to psychological distress for participants.","Impact":"Increased stress, anxiety, and negative mental health outcomes for participants.","Mitigation":"Ensure informed consent and provide support resources for participants experiencing distress. Consider ethical guidelines for the measurement of sensitive topics.","Technologies":"Survey design tools, mental health assessment tools.","People":"Researchers, mental health professionals, participants.","Owner":"Research team, IRB or ethics committee."}]}
